titleStmt.title: By His Majesties Permission. These are to give notice to all ladys, and others, that Claudius Dupuys, in Long-Acre at the sign of the Kings Arms, ...
titleStmt.author: Dupuys, Claudius.

notesStmt.note: Title includes first lines of text.
Royal coat of arms at head of text, with initials W. R.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
